text: this is get eaten for the New York Times
making a decision to choose between a
multitude of choices can be a difficult
task but with apps like choice map on
your smartphone the decision making
process needn't be such an onerous one
choice map which is free for iOS is
designed to guide you through making a
decision it's two main goals are
streamlining the decision making process
and helping you quantify the different
options you can choose among to use the
app you simply enter the type of
decision you want to make for example
which type of car you would like to buy
then you enter a list of criteria that
will help you decide for example cost or
fuel efficiency and you rate these on a
sliding scale
as to how important they are in making
your decision the app thing guides you
through each of the potential options
you can choose and on screen you slide
sliders around for the different
criteria to rate how important they are
for each option
finally the app then shows you a bar
chart with the best or higher scoring
decision at the top I like this app for
its simplicity and the fact it gives you
some faith that you're using some kind
of rationale in making a decision on
Android the app decision buddy is a very
different beast though it too is a
decision making app that's designed to
help you choose among all the different
options using some kind of logic it's
real strength is in helping a group of
people come to a decision
you know those awkward ones like which
restaurant we should go to and for this
it uses your device's touchscreen as a
kind of voting interface
decision buddy could help you avoid a
number of arguments and it's free lastly
for those decisions you just want your
smartphone to choose an answer for at
random the app decide now which is $1 an
iOS is perfect it's like a wheel of
fortune for the number of different
decision options you enter into it you
spin the wheel and then simply choose to
do what the app tells you to do when the
wheel stops spinning it can be
surprisingly refreshing to make
decisions like this and the app is very
customizable and that's it from me
good luck sorting among all those
choices
